#summary Describe action model that is used in our system.
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

All actions in our system is done using *[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.Kernel.IAction IAction]* interface.


= Details =

For now we have ( from Artem Shynkarenko point of view) folowing sets of actions
  * *[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.Kernel.FileActions.IFileAction IFileAction]* are used for local file system operations
  * *[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.Kernel.SqlActions.ISqlAction ISqlAction]* are used for operations with Database
  * *[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.AbstractUI.UIActions.IUIAction IUIAction]* are used for operations with [http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/AbstractUIModel Abstract UI]
  * Set of custom actions for installation/updating/uninstalling of plugs (*[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.Kernel.IRegisterAction IRegisterAction]*, *[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.Kernel.IUpdateAction IUpdateAction]*, *[http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/Interlogic.Trainings.Plugs.Kernel.IUnregisterAction IUnregisterAction]*)

See also: [http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/AbstractUIModel Abstract UI model], [http://code.google.com/p/ilsdev/wiki/PlugInModel Plug-in model]
